titles.title: More Paid Leave for More Americans Act
More Paid Leave for More Americans Act

To direct the Secretary of Labor to carry out a grant program to award grants to States to carry out a paid family leave program, to establish the Interstate Paid Leave Action Network, and for other purposes.
